name: Santa's Secret (Ghost_0001)
description:
Merry Christmas and thanks for coming! Here's a fun adventure I put together for the Totally Ranked Holiday Jam! There will be future updates after my semester is over, but for now...there are two endings to achieve. Please leave any comments or feedback at the bottom. I really do appreciate it!

If you see an error message, you will need to allow third party cookies.

Your host, Ghost

PS: I hid a couple easter eggs... 

Credits: Written and Developed by: Ghost Special Thanks to: Each of my friends and family Music compositions by: Nicolas Gasparini (Myuu) Sound Effects Libraries by: Boom Library and Joseph Sardin Siren Sound Effect was recorded by: Delilah (Attribution 3[[.->Easter Egg]]0) soundbible.com Music and Sound Design Mixed by: Ghost Pictures under creative commons from pexels.com
